<function-thoughts>I have found the email thread about the client meeting. The information about who attended the meeting and key points discussed are in the emails. I will now provide a summary of the key points.</function-thoughts>
<answer>The key points from the client meeting are not explicitly mentioned in these emails, but based on what we can gather:

- A follow-up email was drafted by Katie.
- The draft was reviewed and edited by Emma.
- David and Julie also reviewed and approved the edits.
